subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Samardzija threw six shutout innings to outpitch Corey Kluber, Jose Abreu finished 2 for 4 with three R.B.I., and the Chicago White Sox beat the visiting Cleveland Indians.
snippet: Samardzija threw six shutout innings to outpitch Corey Kluber, Jose Abreu finished 2 for 4 with three R.B.I., and the Chicago White Sox beat the visiting Cleveland Indians.
